headline: Saudi Arabia Water and Wastewater Treatment Industry Report 2025-2033 Featuring Ecolab, Veolia, 3M, Pentair, Dow Chemical, Aquatech Int'l, Calgon Carbon, Xylem, DuPont, Parkson
summary: The Saudi Arabia Water and Wastewater Treatment Market is projected to grow significantly from US$ 4.03 billion in 2024 to US$ 7.43 billion by 2033, at a CAGR of 7.05%. Driven by urbanization, industrialization, and governmental sustainability initiatives, the market prioritizes sustainable water management and reuse strategies. The government is investing heavily in infrastructure, especially under Vision 2030, and collaborating with public and private sectors to upgrade treatment plants. Despi
